summary: This document is an inmate housing history record for Leonardo Fernandez, detailing his cell assignments and transfers within the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) and other facilities from August 2019 to August 2021. It provides a detailed log of his movements within the federal prison system over a two-year period.

persons.name: Fernandez, Leonardo

keyFacts: Leonardo Fernandez was incarcerated in the federal prison system from at least August 2019 through August 2021.
The document shows frequent cell transfers between different housing units and facilities, indicating movement within the prison system.
The record uses facility codes like THA, DMA, OHL, BRO, and NYM which correspond to different housing units or facilities.
The document was generated on August 2, 2021, showing housing history up to that date.
This appears to be a standard inmate tracking document rather than one specifically related to Epstein case events.
